segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets line the walls, one door ajar with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes her dish, back to the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet floods the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, ruining the cabinet faces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss this disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy risks it all on the shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below, pleading with open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is sweet amid the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the stool's instability shocks me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall could injure them badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view heightens the indoor tension.
segments.speaker: PAR
